What's with the "Alien" reference?

Nostromo was Ripleys first ship.
  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sen=
t: Saturday, December 23, 2000 5:13 PM
  Subject: Tripredacus (Predacons sh=
ould read)


  Yanshosh and I, so far, are roleplaying these guys. When the=
y combine they are under each of our control, but make sure to read the pos=
ts of the others so they know what is going on.
   
  ::Sea Clamp/Cicadon/R=
amhorn::
   
      The infamous members of the Tripredacus Council had lear=
ned of what was going on on past Earth. They decided that it was nessary fo=
r their personal intervention. Preparing a ship to leave they had a crew of=
 about forty bots, none with Beast Modes. They themselves had reengineered =
their bodies to accomadate Beast Modes and a Gestalt.
      The ship, Nostr=
omo, left the dock. It created a Transwarp conduit and went through. Soon t=
hey were all through. Sea Clamp was at the helm, Cicadon was at the Navagat=
ion, and Ramhorn was manning the weapons systems. Almost all of the lights =
had gone out, all that was on were red warning lights, which would make it =
difficult for anybody to see. The crew had been eradicated, no chance for r=
ebellion. But, smartly, their Sparks had not been extinguised, they had bee=
n stored in small capsules for later use. Tripredacus had been looking for =
the last remaining ones when they saw something they did not expect. The Ar=
k. In Space. They knew this was a great chance, but the last of the remiani=
ng Predacons attacked them at that point. They did not have the chance to d=
estroy the Ark. But they would. The last of the rebels had been ejected fro=
m the ship.
      The Nostromo had a easy landing. Tripredacus dismanteled =
the thruster system, Sea Clamp spoke up in a raspy voice. "No one goes home=
."
      "Agreed," The other two said. They decided to look for the other P=
redacons on this planet, and begin their plan of the destruction of the Ark=
, and the Autobots.

        eGroups Sponsor
